Text: I just finished this movie and i got to say.. FUCKING GREAT!!!. much better than i thought it was going to be. i was almost in tears it was so funny. better than superbad, beerfest, all that. very funny movie.. and Bone.? since you are my favorite uploader. will you please upload the damn show triligy?? please for fuck sake. ive posted it a couple times before but no one has yet. its really recommended for a few good laughs. all ive seen is the first one and fucking god is that shit funny... please man.. your my only hope.. ill love you even more than i already do. thanks man. please...
